content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: chiseled_polished_blackstone
inventory=[{"type": "polished_blackstone_slab", "quantity": 2, "index": 11}, {"type": "glistering_melon_slice", "quantity": 63, "index": 15}, {"type": "prismarine", "quantity": 56, "index": 24}, {"type": "salmon_spawn_egg", "quantity": 46, "index": 25}, {"type": "golden_leggings", "quantity": 1, "index": 35}]
thought: To craft a chiseled_polished_blackstone, I need to place 2 polished_blackstone_slabs side by side in the crafting grid. I will move one polished_blackstone_slab from slot 11 to slot 1.
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: chiseled_polished_blackstone
inventory=[{"type": "polished_blackstone_slab", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_slab", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "glistering_melon_slice", "quantity": 63, "index": 15}, {"type": "prismarine", "quantity": 56, "index": 24}, {"type": "salmon_spawn_egg", "quantity": 46, "index": 25}, {"type": "golden_leggings", "quantity": 1, "index": 35}]
thought: Since I have already moved one polished_blackstone_slab to slot 1, I will move the second polished_blackstone_slab to slot 4, which is to the right of slot 1.
act: move from slot 11 to slot 4 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: chiseled_polished_blackstone
inventory=[{"type": "chiseled_polished_blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_slab", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_slab", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "glistering_melon_slice", "quantity": 63, "index": 15}, {"type": "prismarine", "quantity": 56, "index": 24}, {"type": "salmon_spawn_egg", "quantity": 46, "index": 25}, {"type": "golden_leggings", "quantity": 1, "index": 35}]
thought: Now that I have placed the polished_blackstone_slabs in the crafting grid, I can craft the chiseled_polished_blackstone and move it to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 1
